Consensus.title: Consensus Height
Consensus.description: The block height the node is currently working on

Consensus.title: Consensus Round
Consensus.description: The round the node is currently working on

Consensus.title: Average Consensus Round
Consensus.description: Average consensus round (10m window)

Consensus.title: Average Block Time
Consensus.description: Average block time (10m window)

Consensus.title: Consensus Rounds Above Zero
Consensus.description: The number of times the consensus round has increased above zero (10m window)

Consensus.title: Height Diff Between Nodes
Consensus.description: The difference between the highest and lowest consensus heights between nodes

Consensus.title: Consensus Height Diff From Sync
Consensus.description: The difference between the consensus height and the sync height

Consensus.title: Decisions Reached By Consensus
Consensus.description: The number of decisions reached by way of consensus (10m window)

Consensus.title: Decisions Reached By Sync
Consensus.description: The number of decisions reached by way of sync (10m window)

Consensus.title: Proposals Received
Consensus.description: The number of proposals received from the network (10m window)

Consensus.title: Proposal Validation Success
Consensus.description: The number of proposals received and validated successfully (10m window)

Consensus.title: Proposal Validation Failed
Consensus.description: The number of proposals received and failed validation (10m window)

Consensus.title: Validate Proposal Failure by Reason
Consensus.description: The number of validate proposal failures (10m window)

Consensus.title: Proposal Validation Breakdown
Consensus.description: Breakdown of proposals by validation result. There are more validations, but they are not reported here (10m window)

Consensus.title: Proposal Build
Consensus.description: The number of proposals that started building (10m window)

Consensus.title: Proposal Build Failed
Consensus.description: The number of proposals that failed to be built (10m window)

Consensus.title: Build Proposal Failure by Reason
Consensus.description: The number of build proposal failures (10m window)

Consensus.title: Consensus Timeouts By Reason
Consensus.description: The number of times consensus has timed out (10m window)

Consensus.title: Number of Batches Received in Proposal
Consensus.description: The number of transaction batches received in a valid proposal

Consensus.title: Number of Transactions in Proposal Received
Consensus.description: The total number of individual transactions in a valid proposal received

Consensus.title: consensus_l2_gas_price
Consensus.description: The L2 gas price calculated in an accepted proposal

Consensus.title: consensus_max_cached_block_number
Consensus.description: How many blocks after current are cached

Consensus.title: consensus_cached_votes
Consensus.description: How many votes are cached when starting to work on a new block number

Consensus.title: consensus_reproposals
Consensus.description: The number of reproposals sent

Consensus.title: consensus_new_value_locks
Consensus.description: The number of times consensus has attained a lock on a new value

Consensus.title: consensus_held_locks
Consensus.description: The number of times consensus progressed to a new round while holding a lock

Consensus.title: consensus_inbound_stream_started
Consensus.description: The total number of inbound streams started

Consensus.title: consensus_inbound_stream_evicted
Consensus.description: The total number of inbound streams evicted due to cache capacity

Consensus.title: consensus_inbound_stream_finished
Consensus.description: The total number of inbound streams finished

Consensus.title: consensus_outbound_stream_started
Consensus.description: The total number of outbound streams started

Consensus.title: consensus_outbound_stream_finished
Consensus.description: The total number of outbound streams finished

Cende.title: Write Blob Success
Cende.description: The number of successful blob writes to Cende (10m window)

Cende.title: Write Blob Failure by Reason
Cende.description: The number of failed blob writes to Cende (10m window)

Cende.title: Write Blob Latency
Cende.description: The time it takes to write the blob to Cende

Cende.title: Last Prepared Blob Block Number
Cende.description: The block number that is ready to be sent to Cende in the next height

Cende.title: Prepare Blob for Next Height Latency
Cende.description: The time it takes to prepare the blob for the next height

Batcher.title: batched_transactions_rate (TPS)
Batcher.description: The rate of transactions batched by the Batcher during the last minute

Batcher.title: Proposal Started
Batcher.description: Number of proposals started over the last 10 minutes

Batcher.title: Proposal Succeeded
Batcher.description: Number of proposals succeeded over the last 10 minutes

Batcher.title: Proposal Failed
Batcher.description: Number of proposals failed over the last 10 minutes

Batcher.title: Proposal Aborted
Batcher.description: Number of proposals aborted over the last 10 minutes

Batcher.title: batcher_validator_wasted_txs
Batcher.description: Number of txs executed by validator but not included in the block

Batcher.title: batcher_proposer_deferred_txs
Batcher.description: Number of txs started execution but not finished by end of proposal by proposer

Batcher.title: batcher_batched_transactions
Batcher.description: Counter of batched transactions across all forks

Batcher.title: batcher_last_batched_block_height
Batcher.description: The height of the last block received by batching

Batcher.title: batcher_storage_height
Batcher.description: The height of the batcher's storage

Batcher.title: batcher_last_synced_block_height
Batcher.description: The height of the last block received by syncing

Batcher.title: batcher_last_proposed_block_height
Batcher.description: The height of the last block proposed by this sequencer

Batcher.title: rejection_ratio
Batcher.description: Ratio of rejected transactions out of all processed, over the last 5 minutes

Batcher.title: reverted_transactions_ratio
Batcher.description: Ratio of reverted transactions out of all processed, over the last 5 minutes

State Sync.title: apollo_state_sync_processed_transactions
State Sync.description: The number of transactions processed by the state sync component since its last restart

State Sync.title: apollo_state_sync_reverted_transactions
State Sync.description: The number of transactions reverted by the state sync component

State Sync.title: apollo_central_sync_central_block_marker
State Sync.description: The first block number that doesn't exist yet

State Sync.title: apollo_state_sync_body_marker
State Sync.description: The first block number for which the state sync component does not have a body

State Sync.title: apollo_state_sync_class_manager_marker
State Sync.description: The first block number for which the state sync component does not guarantee all of the corresponding classes are stored in the class manager component

State Sync.title: apollo_state_sync_header_marker
State Sync.description: The first block number for which the state sync component does not have a header

State Sync.title: apollo_state_sync_state_marker
State Sync.description: The first block number for which the state sync component does not have a state body

Http Server.title: http_server_transactions_received_rate (TPS)
Http Server.description: The rate of transactions received by the HTTP Server during the last minute

Http Server.title: http_server_added_transactions_internal_error
Http Server.description: Number of faulty added transactions failing on internal error

Http Server.title: http_server_added_transactions_deprecated_error
Http Server.description: Number of faulty added transactions failing on deprecated error

Http Server.title: http_server_add_tx_latency
Http Server.description: Latency of HTTP add_tx endpoint in secs

Gateway.title: gateway_transactions_received_rate (TPS)
Gateway.description: The rate of transactions received by the gateway during the last 20 minutes

Gateway.title: gateway_add_tx_latency
Gateway.description: Latency of gateway add_tx function in secs

Gateway.title: gateway_validate_tx_latency
Gateway.description: Latency of gateway validate function in secs

Gateway.title: gateway_transactions_sent_to_mempool
Gateway.description: Counter of transactions sent to the mempool

Mempool.title: mempool_transactions_received
Mempool.description: Counter of transactions received by the mempool

Mempool.title: mempool_transactions_received_rate (TPS)
Mempool.description: The rate of transactions received by the mempool during the last 20 minutes

Mempool.title: mempool_transactions_dropped
Mempool.description: Counter of transactions dropped from the mempool

Mempool.title: mempool_txs_committed
Mempool.description: The number of transactions that were committed to block

Mempool.title: mempool_pool_size
Mempool.description: The average size of the pool

Mempool.title: mempool_priority_queue_size
Mempool.description: The average size of the priority queue

Mempool.title: mempool_pending_queue_size
Mempool.description: The average size of the pending queue

Mempool.title: mempool_total_size_bytes
Mempool.description: The average total transaction size in bytes over time in the mempool

Mempool.title: mempool_get_txs_size
Mempool.description: The average size of the get_txs

Mempool.title: mempool_delayed_declare_size
Mempool.description: The average number of delayed declare transactions

Mempool.title: mempool_transaction_time_spent
Mempool.description: The time (seconds) a transaction spent in the mempool before removal (any reason - commit, reject, TTL expiry, fee escalation, or eviction)

Mempool.title: mempool_transaction_time_spent_until_committed
Mempool.description: The time (seconds) a transaction spent in the mempool until it was committed

L1 Provider.title: l1_message_scraper_success_count
L1 Provider.description: Number of times the L1 message scraper successfully scraped messages and updated the provider

L1 Provider.title: l1_message_scraper_baselayer_error_count
L1 Provider.description: Number of times the L1 message scraper encountered an error while scraping the base layer

L1 Provider.title: l1_message_scraper_reorg_detected
L1 Provider.description: Number of times the L1 message scraper detected a reorganization in the base layer

L1 Gas Price.title: eth_to_strk_error_count
L1 Gas Price.description: Number of times the query to the Eth to Strk oracle failed due to an error or timeout

L1 Gas Price.title: eth_to_strk_success_count
L1 Gas Price.description: Number of times the query to the Eth to Strk oracle succeeded

L1 Gas Price.title: l1_gas_price_provider_insufficient_history
L1 Gas Price.description: Number of times the L1 gas price provider calculated an average with too few blocks

L1 Gas Price.title: l1_gas_price_scraper_success_count
L1 Gas Price.description: Number of times the L1 gas price scraper successfully scraped and updated gas prices

L1 Gas Price.title: l1_gas_price_scraper_baselayer_error_count
L1 Gas Price.description: Number of times the L1 gas price scraper encountered an error while scraping the base layer

L1 Gas Price.title: l1_gas_price_scraper_reorg_detected
L1 Gas Price.description: Number of times the L1 gas price scraper detected a reorganization in the base layer

L1 Gas Price.title: l1_gas_price_scraper_latest_scraped_block
L1 Gas Price.description: The latest block number that the L1 gas price scraper has scraped

L1 Gas Price.title: l1_gas_price_latest_mean_value
L1 Gas Price.description: The latest L1 gas price, calculated as an average by the provider client

L1 Gas Price.title: l1_data_gas_price_latest_mean_value
L1 Gas Price.description: The latest L1 data gas price, calculated as an average by the provider client

Blockifier.title: class_cache_miss_ratio
Blockifier.description: The ratio of cache misses when requesting compiled classes from the Blockifier State Reader

Blockifier.title: native_class_returned_ratio
Blockifier.description: The ratio of Native classes returned by the Blockifier
